title: Deadly Conspiracy
description: In this Dateline classic, a woman leaves her ailing father for just 15 minutes and during that brief time he is stabbed to death. A buried clue indicates the murder was a conspiracy. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 15, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
